channel.title: 金融时报
channel.description: 这是一个追踪金融时报news的种子

item.title: 美国正在进行 "超级星期二 "选举。今晚的选举结果将使美国离 11 月乔-拜登和唐纳德-特朗普的总统复选更近一步，因为选民们都在投票
item.description:
Super Tuesday is underway in the US. Tonight’s results will put the country one step closer to a Joe Biden-Donald Trump presidential rematch in November as voters hit the polls https://t.co/fhG4D5DbqW pic.twitter.com/4SCO90AvyL

— Financial Times (@FT) March 5, 2024

item.title: FT 独家报道：普华永道发现三名高级合伙人违反了领导层选举规则，因此剥夺了他们的管理职位，并取消了其中一人竞选美国业务的资格
item.description:

— Financial Times (@FT) March 5, 2024

item.title: 什么是超级星期二？这是美国初选日程中最重要的一天，民主党和共和党的获胜者将获得冷冰冰的数学裁决：他们将成为本党的总统候选人。从我们的实时博客中了解更多信息
item.description:
What is Super Tuesday and why does it matter?
It is the most important day of the US primary calendar, giving the Democratic and Republican winners a verdict backed by cold maths: they are their party’s pick for president. Find out more from our live blog https://t.co/pNX4NFtyW1

— Financial Times (@FT) March 5, 2024

item.title: 如果 QT 运行良好，那么 QE 就有了充分的理由。警告，我的通讯将讨论事件研究能告诉我们什么，不能告诉我们什么。
item.description:
Does QE deserve to come out of the sin bin?

If QT works well, that makes a strong case. Warning, my newsletter discusses what event studies do and don't tell us

Answer: a tentative yeshttps://t.co/ggqpIpgbkU pic.twitter.com/0t2Jk6REbk

— Chris Giles (@ChrisGiles_) March 5, 2024
